name: Star Scamper
description:
An infinite runner game where the space imp Cosmi runs across the stars and collects items as a fun distraction from his otherworldly duties.

My first attempt at making a game entirely from scratch in Unity! Enjoy.

Controls:

  • Spacebar to jump.
  • Left mouse click to press buttons.

Credits:

  • Code, assets, and game design by Madeleine "Marin" Clark.
